description: This file defines functions for accessing and querying room data in a MongoDB database, specifically focusing on the 'rooms' collection and retrieving public waiting rooms.

methods.name: roomsCollection
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves the 'rooms' collection from the database.

methods.name: findPublicWaitingRooms
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of public rooms with 'waiting' status, limited to a specified number.
